THROWABLE: An internal server error has occurred.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests. Please try again later.
EMPTY_COLLECTION_FIELD: The collection field '{fieldName}' cannot be empty.
INVALID_FIELD_VALUE: The field '{fieldName}' contains an invalid value.
BAD_REQUEST: The request is invalid or cannot be processed.
INVALID_JSON_BODY: Invalid JSON format in the request body.
